Html:
I had some trouble with previous installations of WPP. Now I would like to test WPP on Windows Server 2012 (Version 6.2.9200) with WPP Release v1.3.1702.10.

Are there any special prerequires for this combination? For example needed updates for the server, version of WSUS, configuration of WPP? Should I publish WPP-Pakets in WSUS?

Thank you very much for some help.
